Total number of events found with filter applied.
This property can be used to show the total number of items found,
before you actually fetch all items using pagination.

simulations.description: Optional link available simulations for the current event

eventList.description: List of events matching the search criteria

eventViews.description: List of views available for a given event. The first item in the list is the default view

extendedTimestamp.description: Timestamp, point in time following ISO 8601 with time zone specifier (local time or UTC)

filterExpression.description:
Filter collection according to given criteria.

Grammar
-------

filter = expression [ connector expression ] ;

connector = "," | ";" ;

expression = field operator value ;

operator = "==" | "<>" | ">" | "<" | ">=" | "<=" | "*=" | "!=";

fields for events = "sid" | "host" | "instnr" | "start_date" | "end_date" | "type" | 'id' | "run_type" | "system_type"

fields for elements = "start_date" | "end_date" | "name" | "type" | "runtime"

value = string ;


Example:

sid==ABC,sid==CDE;instNr==123456;start_date>2019-01-12;type==S/4HANA Conversion,type==Upgrade

Translated to SQL:

(sid==ABC OR:sid==CDE) AND instNr=='123456' AND start_date>'2\;019-01-12\' AND (TYPE==S4CONVERSION OR TYPE==UPGRADE)

Explanation: return items having sid equal to ABC or sid equal to CDE. All results must
have instNr equal to 123456. All results must have start_date later than "2019-01-12". All results must have type of either "S/4HANA Conversion" or "Upgrade"

Connector "," groups expressions with "OR" logic.
Connector ";" groups expressions with "AND" logic.
OR connector have precedence over AND connector.

duration_change_rate.description: Relative change of duration from base (rate)

flatDurationTree.description: Duration object as a flat list

id.description: The ID of the duration tree

count.description: Number of elements in the bin

histogramBins.description:
The desired number of bins of a histogram.
This argument is alternative to _step_width_ (only one is allowed)
All running processes will be split into the bins.

histogramStep.description:
The amount of time in seconds which one bin should be made of.
This argument is alternative to _bins_ (only one is allowed)
If specified, number of bins is calculated by dividing whole range by the given
width of a step.

instnr.description: Installation Number (string because of INITIAL & INTERN)

maxResult.description:
Limit number of items in result set. Result set size can be equal or less then
specified number. If the total result set is larger than possible to return
with given maxResult, the link to next page of results is provided.

If _next_ page link is present in reply, the result set is incomplete.
Called can use this link to retrive next portion of result.

formatted.description: Human friendly representation of the value

dbSize.description: This measure describes an uncompressed size of data in database as calculated by Software Update Manager

minDuration.description:
Limit result to items with duration is longer than specified.
Duration is in seconds.
Durations for results, which are shorter than specified threshold are collapsed
(sum) into pseudo element with the name 'Others'.
This element is added to the result set if _minDuration_ attribute is specified.

nodeDisplayName.description: Display name of the node to show on duration chart in UI

nodeId.description: Technical name of the node in the duration tree

nodeStatements.description: Messages (check results, recommendations) for a given node

maxImportance.description: Maximal importance of messages in the statement list

statementList.description: List of statements for a current node

nodeType.description: The type of the node in a cutover node list

orderBy.description:
Sort result along fields.

_orderBy_ term consists of field name and optionally tag 'desc' indicating reverse sorting
(from large to little).  Per default sorting order is ascending (from little to large).

Grammar:
--------

order_expression = order_term { "," order_term } ;

order_term = field { " " [ "desc" ] } ;

field = "sid" | "host" | "instnr" | "start_date" | "end_date" | "type" | 'id' ;

See specific list of supported filter terms in the description of
the corresponding endpoint.

Example:

sid, start_date desc

pageToken.description:
Limit result set to a specific page. Used for paged navigation though result sets.

Page tokens expire after 24 hours. Caller must repeat initial query to collection
to obtain fresh page token. It is not possible to change maxResult, filter or sorting
order of results during pagination (initial values set by first query of the
collection remained applied).

Specification of pageToken and maxResult, "filter" or "order_by" parameters
in the same query is not allowed. Same query parameters remain effective for next pages.

duration.description: Describes how long the phase took to complete

runType.description:
The type of the maintenance event.
Can be Go-Live (real) or an upgrade of a sandbox system (test).

description.description: Descriptiton of the simulation in Markdown

id.description: Technical name of the simulation (ID) used for referencing it in API

incompatibleSimulations.description: List of simulation IDs which are not compatible with this simulation.

forecast.description: Simulation forecasts. The first element is the conservative forecast and the second element is the optimistic forecast

selected_simulations.description: Formatted string about the selected simulations

simulationsRequest.description: Map of simulations holding simulation parameters

statementImportance.description: Importance of the analytical statement (info, warning, critical)

_stmtId.description: Name of the check which produces the statement

text.description: Text of the statement in Markdown format

textHTML.description: Text of the statment in HTML format

systemType.description:
The system type, which undergoes a maintenance event.
Can be development, quality or productive system. Should be one of these values: Production,
Development, Quality, EARLYWATCH, Maintenance Insights Service Upload

description.description: Longer text description of available options for file upload. Formatted in markdown.

descriptionHTML.description: Longer text description of available options for file upload. Formatted in HTML.

displayName.description: Short text of available upload file formats.

uploadResultItem.description: One item of the upload result, represents one file

viewName.description: Name of view, which determine type of duration tree

info.description: Maintenance Insighs Service provides analytical insights about maintenance events
info.title: Maintenance Insights Service

get.description:
Returns list of events. Use this resource to discover available events.

Terms allowed in filter and order_by expressions:
-  sid - system identifier
-  host - hostname of the application server
-  instnr - installation number of the system
-  start_date - begin of the maintenance event
-  end_date - end of the maintenance event
-  type - type of maintenance event (currently supported "UPGRADE" and "S4CONVERSION")
-  id - event identifier
-  start_release - version of SAP_BASIS software component before upgrade
-  target_release - version of SAP_BASIS software component after upgrade
-  system_type (prod, dev, qual, earlywatch)
-  run_type - run type (go-live, sandbox)
